h1: How Many Calories Are in Two Pieces of Pizza?
assumptions: Standard 14-inch cheese pizza, each piece is 1/8 slice (~100g), thin crust, basic tomato sauce and mozzarella; no extra toppings.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by pizza size, crust type, toppings, brand, and baking method. Check labels or restaurant info when available.

quick_answer.text: Two pieces of cheese pizza provide about 570 kcal and 24 g protein.
